Fishing Tutorial:
What kind of Bait and Fishing Rod you use, affects the duration and success of fishing.
Bait - duration and waiting time for fishing
The duration of fishing depends on the type of bait. Bait from Shop
Fishing - 105 seconds, waiting - 15 seconds.
To fish once, it takes 120 seconds.
Fishing rod - shortening the duration of fishing
The fishing rod shortens the duration of fishing. Ordinary Fishing Rod and Sturdy Fishing Rod do not affect the duration of the sparrow, but when using the Fishing Rod's Fur lvl.1 and higher, the time is shortened
Float - increase the success of fishing
The float affects the success of fishing
